Texts.Eng: I've found an ancient text, and am alarmed. Scrawled within are coordinates that match up exactly with a ^orange;recent research expedition^reset; we sent out to the fringes. I get no response when hailing them. S.A.I.L can take me there.
With no survivors, all that I have to report is...avoid this world. Recommending immediate sterilization of the site via orbital bombardment. No one should suffer that, ever again.
